		Student Management System Using Python and Files

"Student Management System (SMS) is a solution tool that is designed to track, maintain and manage all the data generated by a School".

The project consists of the following features:-
1.Add New Student
2.View Students
3.Search Student
4.Update Student
5.Delete Student

In this project Python Numbers, Python Functions, I/O operations, Python ifâ€¦else Statement, Python Class and Objects, CSV Files in Python... are implemented.
